answers.answer: O honey! sounds like you are in a bad situation!  i will be praying for you! i this has to be so embarrising, and you should talk to your doctor about that due to it could be peinching a nerve and you dont have very much feeling or due to lack of blood in the area! i wish you luck!!your in my prayers

Hve you been to a neurologist or a rheumatologist or a GI doc?  The bowel is rather complicated system.  The hair loss sounds like something to do with the immune system and th numbness sounds neurological.I'm so sorry you're having so much trouble!  Hang in there and be sure to tell your doctors everything.

question: I have felt like crap for over a year, hair loss(a lot), weight loss that I cannot detect as my tummy is larger and distended..bloods are ok but had ultrasounds done and they came back with cystic tumors or tumors I blanked when I heard tumor, these are inside my bowel. I am nauseus, tired, lots of abdominal pain diahrea, Lower back pain around kidney area and headaches..I feel hot all the time. now they are sending me to a cat scan ...what is or sounds like is going on...Oh my hair on arms and fingers is gone too...Other things include: Numb legs and hands. I have diabetes but I loose allllll movement for days, end up wetting myself as I cant get to the bathroom. I have depends now and am only 37. also in the last couple months I loose my bowel functions and have accidents just by standing up.I sometimes don't know I have to go number 2 and it just happens..
title: I feel like I am dying and nobody hears me
